p.s: The play Disgraced, Scene 3 by Ayad Akhtar, written in 2013, is about the balance of religion and society especially in the post-9/11 era.
The given excerpt deals with a dispute between Amir, Emily, Jory and Isaac about a possible affair and a promotion.
At the beginning of the excerpt Jory is coming back inside seeing Isaac and Emily kissing each other.
She confronts them about having an affair.
AmirFollowsfollows her back in the apartment.
He confronts Jory about the promotion she kept quiet about.
Emily wants to explain the situation that Isaac only want to console her because she heard about the promotion Amir did not get.
After this Amir is angry with Jory because he thinks she wants to destroy his marriage after she already stole his job.
After hearing this Isaac calls Amir an asshole and Amir insults him back.
They are about to fight when Amir spits in Isaac's face.
When Jory and Isaac were gone Emily admits that she was having an affair with Isaac.
She tries to apologize and explain everything to Amir.
As an reaction Amir hits Emily multiple times in her face.
At the end of the excerpt Amir's nephew Abe enters the apartment and sees Emily laying on the ground.
